text: Arau allahe yadi manuhaka sihamtara krtakarmara babe karaayatta karailehemtena, tente bhu-prsthata kono praanike'i te'om raeha'i nidilehemtena, kintu te'om eta nirdista samaya laike sihamtaka arakasa diye. Eteke yetiya sihamtara nirdista samaya ahi yaba, (tetiyahe te'om sihamtaka karaayatta karaiba) niscaya allaha te'omra bandasakalara bisaye samyaka drasta
